long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track time easily in your browser with MyZone time tracker. With just one click you can track your time while working on projects. It is so easy to use!

Track your time with myZone extension:

Step 1:
Install MyZone Chrome time tracking extension.

Step 2:
When you start working on a project start timer and capture your hours.

Step 3:
Once you are done, stop the timer. It will stop counting and copy time into "Time logged".
If you hit stop timer and don't submit your work before closing the app, it will be lost, so watch on that.

Step 4:
Enter details. You can add Project, Project contract, Date, Milestone, Feature, Work type, Work description, and Task URL.

MyZone time tracker will make your work much easier!
